[Swift Sneak](/Feats.aspx?ID=5222) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You can move your full Speed when you Sneak. You can use Swift Sneak while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

<title level="2">Swift Sneak leads to...</title>
[Legendary Sneak](/Feats.aspx?ID=5173)
